description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省吕梁市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Lüliang, Shanxi, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲东部的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于山西省的一所高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Shanxi Province.

en: Shanxi Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanxi Province.

nodes.id: 山西省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 山西省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 山西省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国诗词爱好者组成的全国性社会学术团体。
description.en: A national social and academic organization composed of Chinese poetry enthusiasts.

nodes.id: 中国政治学会 (中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 中国政治学会 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国性的政治学学术团体。
description.en: The national academic association for political science in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 武正国是山西交城人。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo is from Jiaocheng, Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 武正国早年供职于山西化工学院。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo worked at the Shanxi Institute of Chemical Technology in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，武正国担任中共山西省委办公厅主任。
description.en: In 1982, Wu Zhengguo served as the Director of the General Office of the CPC Shanxi Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，武正国任中共山西省委秘书长。
description.en: In 1995, Wu Zhengguo was appointed as the Secretary-General of the CPC Shanxi Provincial Committee.

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Provincial Committee

description.zh-cn: 1996年，武正国任山西省省委常委。
description.en: In 1996, Wu Zhengguo became a member of the Standing Committee of the Shanxi Provincial Party Committee.

relationships.target: 山西省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2000年，武正国改任山西省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: In 2000, Wu Zhengguo was reassigned to the position of Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 武正国是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 武正国是中国作家协会会员。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo is a member of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 武正国曾担任中华诗词学会副会长。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo served as the Vice President of the China National Association of Poetry.

description.zh-cn: 武正国曾担任中华诗词学会顾问。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo served as a consultant for the China National Association of Poetry.

relationships.target: 中国政治学会 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 武正国曾担任中国政治学会副会长。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo served as the Vice President of the Chinese Association of Political Science.

relationships.target: 中国政治学会 (中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 武正国曾担任中国政治学会理事。
description.en: Wu Zhengguo served as a council member of the Chinese Association of Political Science.
